alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 5:55PM EDT until September 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Brevard County in east central Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 555 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Patrick Shores, or over Patrick Air Force Base, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Indialantic, and Camp Holly Fish Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
